article: We call the Chinese New Year the Spring Festival. There is an  _  name for each Chinese year . We may call it the year of the  _  , the year of the monkey or the year of the dog . Before New Year's Day , people are  _  shopping and  cleaning  their houses . On New Year's Eve, there is a big family dinner . After dinner , all the family stay up late to  _  the New Year . On the  _  day of the New Year , people  put on  their new clothes and to visit their friends . They say  Happy new year  and some other greetings each other . People  _  have a good time  _  the festival .
